title: This Indy library has been updated for the first time in 107 years

text: This Indy library has been updated for the first time in 107 years Amy Bartner , amy.bartner@indystar.com 3:39 p.m. ET Feb. 23, 2017 Facebook A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Buy Photo A large seating area surrounded by bookshelves at the renovated East Washington library branch in Indianapolis, seen on Wednesday, Feb. 22, 2017. Jenna Watson/IndyStar Photo courtesy of the Indianapolis Public Library Indianapolis Public Library Fullscreen Buy Photo New quiet study rooms in the renovated East Washington library branch in Indianapolis, seen on Wednesday, Feb. 22, 2017. Jenna Watson/IndyStar Fullscreen Buy Photo The exterior of the renovated East Washington library branch in Indianapolis, seen on Wednesday, Feb. 22, 2017. The library is the last Indianapolis branch to become fully wheelchair accessible. Jenna Watson/IndyStar Photo courtesy of the Indianapolis Public Library Indianapolis Public Library Fullscreen Buy Photo Book gnomes are part of the original exterior architecture facing Washington Street at the renovated East Washington library branch in Indianapolis, seen on Wednesday, Feb. 22, 2017. Jenna Watson/IndyStar Fullscreen Buy Photo Brand new computers in the building addition at the renovated East Washington library branch in Indianapolis, seen on Wednesday, Feb. 22, 2017. Jenna Watson/IndyStar Photo courtesy of the Indianapolis Public Library Indianapolis Public Library Fullscreen Buy Photo A children's area in the renovated East Washington library branch in Indianapolis, seen on Wednesday, Feb. 22, 2017. Jenna Watson/IndyStar Photo courtesy of the Indianapolis Public Library Indianapolis Public Library Fullscreen Buy Photo Branch manager Doriene Smither takes break from preparing for the library's re-opening, at the renovated East Washington library branch in Indianapolis, seen on Wednesday, Feb. 22, 2017. Jenna Watson/IndyStar Fullscreen Buy Photo Communication specialist Jon Barnes at the renovated East Washington library branch in Indianapolis, seen on Wednesday, Feb. 22, 2017. Jenna Watson/IndyStar Fullscreen Buy Photo A wall of exposed brick in the building addition shows the former rear exterior of the renovated East Washington library branch in Indianapolis, seen on Wednesday, Feb. 22, 2017. Jenna Watson/IndyStar Fullscreen Buy Photo The remodeled basement, to be used as a community room, has windows providing natural light at the renovated East Washington library branch in Indianapolis, seen on Wednesday, Feb. 22, 2017. Jenna Watson/IndyStar Fullscreen Buy Photo The basement, to be used as community rooms, features patches of replica antique tin ceiling at the renovated East Washington library branch in Indianapolis, seen on Wednesday, Feb. 22, 2017. Jenna Watson/IndyStar Fullscreen Buy Photo The original circulation desk is used at the renovated East Washington library branch in Indianapolis, seen on Wednesday, Feb. 22, 2017.
